ValidationRule.description: Customer type should not be null at the time of lead changes to Qualified or Converted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Verified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "MyPost Business") ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BG_Standard', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack_Lead' ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Customer_Type__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Customer Type needs to be selected.
